thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 4 of 1735
thread.title: Emile

author: Emile
title: Emile
text:
I had been on vacation with family in Florida when I found out my grandfather has passed away. I immediately started looking at flights for the next day to Geneva. Almost all flights were 2000 dollars Canadian some
Up to 4000. My aunt then told me to look on flight Hub. Luckily I did! I found I flight from Miami to Geneva with a 1 hour lay over in Portugal for 650 dollars Canadian.
Overall great experience, web site is very easy to use. Flight hub contacted me right away to notify me of my itinerary with flight/ info I may need when in Geneva( Hotel, Car, ect)
I will be using flight hub for all my future bookings
